Work with me

I'm always interested in collaborations, partnerships, and opportunities whether travel or photography/videography related. I've got all my own professional equipment, including a Canon 5D MkIV with a range of high-end professional lenses, a GoPro 4 Hero Black with 3-axis electronic stabilizer and Mavic Pro drone, among other things. Photography is my passion, and I do it because I love it! As a result, I take enormous pride in my work, so let me know what you are looking for, and hopefully we can make some incredible photos together!

Recent Projects

No. 29

Kembali Cafe

I had an opportunity to work with this stunning traditional hotel in Marrakech. Honestly, probably one of the most stunning places we visited in Morocco.

 hotel lifestyle

No. 29

Kembali Cafe

The guys at Kembali are all about beautiful food in a gorgeous space. They wanted bright & airy photos that showcased the bright colors of the food & garden.

 restaurant & cafe

No. 28

Joshua District

Joshua District is a group of villas west of Canggu built entirely from recycled shipping containers. Ive been lucky enough to be invited time and again to shoot this amazing series...

 hotel lifestyle

No. 27

Jolyn Swimwear

Jolyn Swimwear is designed for the active woman that wants swimwear to be functional, sexy & comfortable and thats exactly what we set out to showcase with this campaign shoot.
